title: I fail to understand...
body:
Why is championship riven such a big problem for riot to make available?

How is it different to Haunting nocturne and Zombie brand etc etc? they were deemed as 'limited edition' too (as in never coming back) 
and riot was like: 'they're back, heres an icon, deal with it!'

so why is riven such a big deal? why should she be different to nocturne and brand? why cant they just be like "heres another icon, deal with it" That pretty much solves all the problems, just like it did with the other 'limited' skins. 

-

_The problem i have with limited/legacy skins, is that people want them (or want to keep others from getting them) because they are 'exclusive' and being exclusive makes people feel better, because they have something and other people don't. But look at the word itself 'exclusive' actually comes from the word exclusion which means to 'remove people' which is the very essence of 'bullying', now i don't know about you, but i think theres enough negativity in the game already without the need for people to exclude others to make themselves feel special. We can all enjoy the skin, its a nice skin (one of the few actually decent ones riven has) and other people playing the skin doesn't make it any less good-looking, so when you're arguing 'i don't think it should be available' have a think about WHY you think that, if you don't want it to be available because you want to feel special by owning something no one else can get, then you are excluding people, and no one likes to be excluded, so what you are in fact doing is making someone else feel bad so that you can feel good, (which is exactly what bullying is) so have a think about that._

-

**If your enjoyment of the skin comes from the fact that other people are sad because cant have it, that is bullying and i think you don't really deserve to have it.**

replies.body: I fail to see how having something someone else doesn't is bullying.  I guess you are a Bernie supporter?  Take from the people who worked for stuff and give to the people who don't.

Having something someone else doesn't is fine, but trying to prevent someone else from having the same thing is.

And thats what a lot of people who have the skin are trying to do.

Dude Riot is just letting us have some control over the cancer Riven mains, their numbers have luckily died down after the mastery and Season 6 meta has arrived.

Riven/Fiora = The Phantom Menace

ADCs = Attack of the Clones

Tank meta = Revenge of the Sith

It's just one whole huge arc, and if they made Championship Riven available for the general public the Sith would rise again in the form of the Empire, so we must delay what I like to call...

Order 잘못.
